pages.text: A much stronger version of steel, infused with the souls of the damned. I can use this to create stronger weapons, armor, and tools than ever before, even more so than crucible steel, though I'll need to use a much more refined steel anvil to craft these items.

Processing this requires much more preparation involving crucible steel itself, Ender Biotite, soul flux, and a soul urn.$(br2)Combining these items in a stoked crucible will get me a Soulforged Steel ingot, along with the emptied soul urn back.
